title: Dark Haloes: Reunion
description: In the spy game, some secrets are too hot to handle…After their brutal confrontation with the Black Raven terror group, Arella and David finally score some much needed R&R. But their romantic cruise through Europe is cut short when Mossad and the CIA intercept an encrypted Black Raven signal.Another deadly attack is imminent… and this time the target is somewhere in Europe.The pair of operatives battle their way across the continent, taking on a cabal of terrorists and killers. But before they can stop the group’s sinister plan, David’s secrets finally catch up with him…Wounded, on the run, and hunted by an army of assassins, the two agents can only trust each other. As their attraction grows deeper, Arella and David must risk everything, putting both their lives on the line to strike back at their enemies.But Arella has secrets of her own, and she is shocked to discover that the Black Ravens ultimate plan may hold a clue to the fate of her missing family…
author: A.R. Zane
